When you hire an employee, there are 4 r:
When ye hire a crew member, thar be 4 rarities o' crew members that ye can possibly get:
{{{MEmployeeCommon}}}**Humdrum Crew Member** - Will earn x1 th' amount o' doubloons that a cannon can earn.
{{{MEmployeeUncommon}}}**Remarkable Crew Member** - Will earn x1.25 th' amount o' doubloons that a cannon can earn.
{{{MEmployeeRare}}}**Rare Crew Member** - Will earn x1.5 th' amount o' doubloons that a cannon can earn.
{{{MEmployeeLegendary}}}**Legendary Crew Member** - Will earn x2 th' amount o' doubloons that a cannon can earn.

**Fer a cannon t' be restocked 'n earn doubloons, a crew member __must__ be workin' on that cannon. Th' amount o' doubloons earned by a cannon will vary dependin' on th' rarity o' th' crew member 'n th' base earnin's o' th' cannon th' crew member be assigned t'.**
'tis possible fer a crew member t' nah be assigned t' a cannon, but a crew member must be assigned t' a cannon fer that cannon t' produce earnin's.
Crew members will increase yer bounty based on thar rarity 'n assigned cannon.
**What are Golden Tickets?**\nGolden Tic:
**Wha' are Gold Bars?**
Gold Bars are a rare currency in this game that allow ye t' buy legendary upgrades fer yer ship!

**How do I get Gold Bars?**
Rebuildin' yer ship will earn ye Gold Bars! If ye choose t' rebuild yer ship, fer every 25 cannons in yer ship ye will earn 1 Gold Bar! {{{towerRebuildCommand}}}

**How does spendin' Gold Bars work?**
Once ye spend yer Gold Bars, 'twill be assigned t' that upgrade 'til ye rebuild yer ship. If ye rebuild yer ship, all upgrades will be refunded, 'n ye will end up wit' as many Gold Bars as ye had afore spendin' them, plus th' new amount o' Gold Bars ye jus' earned from rebuildin' yer ship!
**What are Supporter Tickets?**\nSupport:
**Wha' are Supporter Bars?**
Supporter bars work exactly th' same as Gold Bars, however, ye get these bars by becomin' a PikaGirl Premium hand. https://pikagirl.me/premium

**Wha' happens if I stop pledgin'?**
If ye happen t' stop pledgin' money on Patreon, or if yer payment fails fer some reason, yer Supporter Bars will be revoked 'n any upgrades that they be used on will also be reset.

**How often do I get th' bars?**
Ye receive th' specified amount o' Supporter Bars across yer entire duration as a PikaGirl Premium hand. Fer example, if ye choose t' be PikaGirl's Casual Friend, then ye will instantly receive 1 Supporter Bar.

Build time determines the multiplier of: Build time determines th' multiplier o' how long it takes fer a cannon t' be built. Th' lower th' multiplier, th' faster cannons will be t' build.

*Psst.* Come over here. Hey, listen, tha:
*Yarr.* Come o'er here. Aye, listen, that's a fairly nice ship ye got thar. I be lookin' t' buy, 'n yer ship looks pretty good. Let's see... *`{{{floors}}}` cannons, every 25 cannons be worth 1 bar...* Alright, I can offer ye {{{goldenTickets}}} Gold Bar(s) fer yer whole ship. Crew, cannons, all o' it. If ye dunno wha' a Gold Bar be, jus' do {{{command_1}}}. Keepin' it short, Gold Bars be a rare currency used t' buy really good upgrades fer yer ship. Jus' t' be clear, this will **reset all hired crew members 'n cannons, 'n yer ship value will be reset. Ye'll keep all yer doubloons, 'n any spent Gold Bars 'n/or Supporter Bars will be refunded.**

Yarr, wit' all that fancy warnin' stuff outta th' way, if ye wants t' go ahead wit' th' deal, jus' type {{{command_2}}}. Remember, thar's no undoin' this!
